meanings.sent1: The noninsured car owner had to pay for the repairs out of pocket.
meanings.sent2: It is risky to be noninsured in case of unexpected medical expenses.
meanings.sent3: The noninsured traveler had to cancel the trip due to illness.
meanings.sent4: Living noninsured is like walking a tightrope without a safety net.
meanings.sent5: The noninsured phone was not eligible for a replacement under the warranty.

meanings.definition: A person or entity without insurance coverage.
meanings.sent1: The noninsured often face financial challenges during emergencies.
meanings.sent2: Being a noninsured can lead to significant financial burdens in case of accidents.
meanings.sent3: The noninsured driver had to cover the full cost of the car repairs.
meanings.sent4: The noninsured individual had to pay the entire hospital bill upfront.
meanings.sent5: The noninsured business struggled to recover after a fire destroyed the premises.
